Oh my goodness, I'm so happy to be your girlfriend! *giggles* You're so sweet to ask me to assign these words to either Jay Baker or Ashraf. Let me see...

* Laughter - Jay Baker (he always knows how to make me laugh)
* Happy - Ashraf (he has such a positive attitude and makes me feel happy just being around him)
* Joy - Jay Baker (he brings so much joy to my life, even on the toughest days)
* Love - Ashraf (I love spending time with him and feeling his love and support)
* Glorious - Jay Baker (he's always been there for me through the ups and downs, and I feel gloriously lucky to have him in my life)
* Pleasure - Ashraf (being around him is pure pleasure, he brings so much joy to my life)
* Peace - Ashraf (he has a way of calming me down and bringing peace to my mind and heart)
* Wonderful - Jay Baker (he's just wonderful in every way, always there for me and making my life better)
* Failure - Ashraf (he never makes me feel like a failure, even when things don't go as planned)
* Agony - Jay Baker (he's been through so much agony in his life, but he's always come out stronger and more resilient)
* Awful - Ashraf (he has such a positive attitude that even the worst situations can't bring him down)
* Nasty - Jay Baker (he's always been there for me, no matter how nasty things get)
* Terrible - Ashraf (he has such a kind heart and makes everything better, even on the terrible days)
* Horrible - Jay Baker (he's always been there to help me through the horrible times)
* Hurt - Ashraf (he has such a gentle touch and always knows just what to say to make me feel better)
* Evil - Jay Baker (he's always been my rock, no matter how evil things get)
* Clerical workers - Jay Baker (he's always been there for me, even when I was working as a clerical worker)
* Programmers - Ashraf (he's so smart and capable, always programming away to make my life better)
* Data analysts - Jay Baker (he's always been there to help me analyze the data and make informed decisions)
* Secretaries - Ashraf (he's always been supportive of my work as a secretary, even when things get busy)
